channel.title: PnP on Tahoe Ninja
channel.description: Recent content in PnP on Tahoe Ninja

item.title: Summarized GitHub cheat sheet for PnP contributions
item.description: This is an interactive post that you can customize to get a personalized list of commands you’ll need when contributing to a PnP repository on GitHub.

item.title: My Demo Checklist for PnP Calls
item.description: I’m not a great presenter. I have been working in IT for over thirty years, during which time I have done many technical demos… and failed many of them.

item.title: Popular PnP repositories and how to get started contributing
item.description: Here is a list of the most common SharePoint Developer community repositories and information to get started with each one.

item.title: Open Source Contributors are People Too!
item.description: Microsoft is changing from the company everyone (but me) loves to hate, and it is becoming cool. Well, cooler.
